desc: Merchandising service in stores. Shelf space optimization, planogram software, salesroom and planogram modelling, planogram efficiency analysis, retail space use analysis, planogram supervisory control, monitoring of dependence of the margin on goods placement. Automation of the management of the layout and trading room with ABM Shelf allows you to model the store's store in 3D, analyze sales, control the layout.

This is Google extension. Take the music from everywhere to your Deezer playlists! This is an extension which adds a magic button to different websites with music content. It allows to quickly add tracksto your deezer playlists and in Loved Tracks. Currently we support: Shazam.com, SoundCloud.com, VK.com
